info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Transylvania and northwestern Greenville Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 754 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Brevard to 18 miles south of Waynesville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Rosman, Caesars Head State Park, Dupont State Forest, Little River In Transylvania County, Balsam Grove, Connestee, Cedar Mountain and Sassafras Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
